issue.title: [JS] read and write compressed (LZ4/LZTD) files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11261](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11261). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
arrow compressed files, such as one produced with R arrow::write_feather are much smaller than those created with write_ipc_stream.

And of course on the web it makes a big difference.

But i can't properly read such 'feather' files with Arrow js (arrow.Table.from).

For instance dictionary values are not properly decoded

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11261?focusedCommentId=17585963) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
